Carragher: "Coutinho wants to go to Barcelona, 100%, but there's nothing wrong with that. I don't think he will force it though."

Carragher: "I hope I'm not saying this in 3 months, but has Klopp had too much faith in the squad? Milner, Moreno - is that moving forward?"
